Package assignment2017

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connect4
    Connect4.java Controls the game's architecture
    Connect4ConsoleDisplay
    Connect4ConsoleDisplay.java Prints the current state of the gamestate
    Connect4ConsoleDisplayGUI
    Connect4ConsoleDisplayGUI.java Display the state of the game with a GUI
    Connect4GameStateTest
    A JUnit test class that tests for basic functionality of the MyGameState class, which should be part of your assignment submission.
    IntelligentPlayer
    IntelligentPlayer.java A player who looks a few turns ahead via the MiniMax algorithm
    KeyboardPlayer
    KeyboardPlayer.java Handles the users input
    MyGameState
    MyGameState.java The state of the connect4 game
    PlayConnect4
    PlayConnect4.java Used to start a new game of connect 4
    RandomPlayer
    RandomPlayer.java It acts as a random player
